javafx.scene.shape

Class HLineTo

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.shape.PathElement
      • javafx.scene.shape.HLineTo

  • public class HLineTo
extends PathElement
    Creates a horizontal line path element from the current point to x.

    For more information on path elements see the Path and PathElement classes.

    Example: 

    import javafx.scene.shape.*;

Path path = new Path();
path.getElements().add(new MoveTo(0.0f, 0.0f));
path.getElements().add(new HLineTo(80.0f));
